item.title: Asia's LNG Retreat Gives Europe Gift for Winter
item.description: Asia’s LNG Retreat a Gift for Europe Asia’s demand for LNG has weakened in recent months, due to a mild winter and a slowdown in economic growth. This has led to a decline in LNG prices, which is good news for Europe.
